events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster, as it fits the role for a Software Developer in our tech department.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to your case. They will guide you through the next steps of the recruitment process.
We have completed an initial screening of your qualifications and experience. You meet our basic requirements and will be invited to a technical interview soon.
Thank you for promptly responding to our invitation. We appreciate your enthusiasm and confirm your availability for the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare for coding challenges and system design questions.
The technical interview was completed successfully. You demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and technical knowledge relevant to the role.
We have scheduled an HR interview to discuss your fit within the company culture and further details about compensation and benefits.
Your HR interview is now complete. The hiring team is impressed with your communication skills and alignment with our company values.
We have extended you a formal offer for the Software Engineer position including salary details and benefits package.
You have sent your feedback accepting the terms of our offer. We are excited about the prospect of you joining our engineering team.
You officially accepted our offer to join the company as a Software Engineer. Welcome aboard!
Your onboarding process has begun. You will receive access to our internal systems and a schedule for your orientation and training sessions.
The hiring process is now officially closed. We are glad to welcome you as a new member of our engineering team and look forward to great achievements.
